author: holiman
content: If the argument is that EL json specs consistently use camelcase, and we want to retain that, I guess that's fair. I had in mind that it was a mixed bag anyway...

author: lightclient
content: i also agree with this, afaik there are no snake case values in the json-rpc currently - starting to add some now might feel like a bug to users imo

author: lightclient
content: i think consistency should be retained here
